translation.msg_levelFailedMessage:
THE LONELY MOUNTAIN IS OVERRUN BY AZOG'S ARMY.

ALL IS NOT LOST - PLAY AGAIN TO DEFEAT THE ORC HORDE.
translation.msg_arrowsEmptyMessage:
YOU HAVE RUN OUT OF ARROWS.

ALL IS NOT LOST, PLAY AGAIN TO RECLAIM THIS LAND.
translation.msg_copyright: © 2014 WARNER BROS. ENT. TM SAUL ZAENTZ CO.
translation.msg_victoryDescription:
THE BATTLE HAS BEEN WON.

AZOG'S FORCES HAVE BEEN VANQUISHED...
BUT FOR HOW LONG?
translation.msg_help1: EACH ARCHER HAS DIFFERENT SKILLS AND ABILITIES. CHOOSE YOUR HERO WISELY
translation.msg_help2:
CLICK/TAP YOUR ARCHER AND DRAG TO AIM AND SET POWER.

RELEASE TO FIRE.
translation.msg_help3:
CLICK/TAP AND DRAG TO SCROLL THE TERRAIN.

CLICK/TAP TO RETURN TO YOUR ARCHER.
translation.msg_help4: COLLECT THESE BONUS ITEMS TO HELP DEFEAT AZOG'S ARMY.
translation.msg_help_torches_copy: SHOOT TORCHES TO DAMAGE NEARBY ENEMIES.
translation.msg_share_levelCompleted_long: I JUST BEAT LEVEL {{level}} OF THE NEW HOBBIT GAME 'ORC ATTACK' WITH {{character}}. CAN YOU BEAT MY SCORE - {{score}}?
translation.msg_share_levelCompleted_short: I JUST BEAT LEVEL {{level}} OF THE NEW HOBBIT GAME CAN YOU BEAT MY SCORE - {{score}}?
translation.msg_share_gameCompleted_long: I JUST FINISHED THE HOBBIT GAME 'ORC ATTACK' DO YOU HAVE THE SKILL TO BEAT {{stars}}/{{maxStars}} ARROWS? CLICK HERE TO PLAY NOW.
translation.msg_share_gameCompleted_short: I JUST FINISHED THE NEW HOBBIT GAME. DO YOU HAVE THE SKILL TO BEAT {{stars}}/{{maxStars}} ARROWS?
translation.msg_share_twitterDefault: PLAY ORC ATTACK AND DEFEAT AZOG'S ARMY

level1.msg_levelObjectives:
TARGET PRACTICE

HIT THE 3 ENEMY ORCS ON THE MAP.

level2.msg_levelObjectives:
MOVING TARGETS ARE MORE DIFFICULT.

TAKE OUT THE PATROLLING ORCS AND THEIR WARG.

level3.msg_levelObjectives:
PLAN YOUR SHOTS TO DEFEAT THE ORCS.

CLICK AND DRAG TO SCROLL THE MAP.

level4.msg_levelObjectives:
NEED HELP TAKING OUT ENEMIES?

SHOOT THE BONUS ITEMS.

level5.msg_levelObjectives:
SPEED IS ESSENTIAL.

DESTROY THE WARGS BEFORE THEY REACH YOU.

level6.msg_levelObjectives:
THE ORCS HAVE OCCUPIED HIGHER GROUND.

CONTROLLING YOUR SHOT POWER
IS VITAL FOR THIS ENGAGEMENT.

level7.msg_levelObjectives:
THE ENEMY HAVE SENT MORE POWERFUL TROOPS.

FOCUS ON HEADSHOTS TO CLAIM SWIFT VICTORY.

level8.msg_levelObjectives:
YOU ARE BESET ON ALL SIDES.

REMEMBER YOUR TRAINING TO SURVIVE THIS BATTLE.

level9.msg_levelObjectives:
PRIORITISING ENEMIES IS A MUST.

DEFEAT THE ARCHERS, THEN DEAL WITH REMAINING ORCS.

level10.msg_levelObjectives:
AN ARCHER OF EREBOR IS FOREVER VIGILANT.

REMAIN ALERT DURING THIS ENGAGEMENT.

level11.msg_levelObjectives:
YOU'VE BEEN FLANKED BY ORCS AND WARGS.

KEEP CALM AND KEEP FIRING.

level12.msg_levelObjectives:
ACCURACY WILL BE THE KEY TO
BRINGING DOWN THIS ORC FORT.

level13.msg_levelObjectives:
IT'LL TAKE TRIAL AND ERROR TO DEFEAT THESE ORCS.

KEEP A CLOSE EYE ON YOUR ARROW COUNT.

level14.msg_levelObjectives:
IF YOU FIND THIS GROUP OF ORCS AND WARGS
OVERWHELMING, LOOK UP FOR ASSISTANCE.

level15.msg_levelObjectives:
AZOG'S FORCES ARE AMASSING.

PROVE YOUR SKILLS WITH A DECISIVE VICTORY.

level16.msg_levelObjectives:
THIS FIGHT MAY SEEM SIMPLE AT FIRST, HOWEVER
THE ENEMY HAS LEARNED TO USE CAMOUFLAGE.

level17.msg_levelObjectives:
THE WARGS ARE AFTER YOUR BLOOD.

DON'T LET THEM PASS OR YOU'LL
BE FIGHTING ON TWO FRONTS.

level18.msg_levelObjectives:
THE ORCS' TACTICS HAVE RESULTED
IN A FIENDISHLY DIFFICULT BATTLE.

GOOD LUCK.

level19.msg_levelObjectives:
ONE ARROW. MANY WARGS.

SPEED AND PRECISION ARE ALL THAT CAN SAVE YOU NOW.

level20.msg_levelObjectives:
THE FINAL BATTLE FOR LONELY MOUNTAIN IS UPON US.

DELIVER US TO GLORIOUS VICTORY.
